text.section:
An election to have no board of directors becomes effective at the later of:
The time that the organization meeting of directors and the issuance of at least one share of stock of the corporation are completed;
The time the charter document in which the election is made becomes effective; or
The time specified in the charter document in which the election is made.
A director automatically ceases to be a director when an election to have no board of directors becomes effective.
